channel.title: 508 Error
channel.description:
[table][tr][td]Well i tryed adding Skillcapes to my server and when i compiled i got this error[/table]
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:97: cannot find symbol symbol : class SkillCapes location: class palidino76.rs2.Engine public static SkillCapes skillCapes = new SkillCapes(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:97: cannot find symbol symbol : class SkillCapes location: class palidino76.rs2.Engine public static SkillCapes skillCapes = new SkillCapes(); ^ 2 errors

item.title: 508 Error
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

Instead of:

import palidino76.rs2.players.items.SkillCape;

Replace it with:

import insidesin.players.items.SkillCape;

In engine.java.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Error
item.dc:creator: @the_sever_guy the_sever_guy
item.description:
@the_sever_guy wrote:

This is was my skillcape file says

/* * Class SkillCapes * * Version 1.6 * * Saturday, September 20, 2008 * * Created by Inside Sin */

package insidesin.players.items;

import insidesin.players.Player;

public class SkillCapes {

public int[] skillCapeID = {			
	9747, 9748, 9948, 9949, 9750, 9751, 9753, 9754, 9756, 9757,9759, 9760, 9762, 9763,
	9765, 9766, 9768, 9769, 9771, 9772, 9774, 9775, 9777, 9778, 9780, 9781, 9783, 9784,
	9786, 9787, 9789, 9790, 9792, 9793, 9795, 9796, 9798, 9799, 9801, 9802, 9804, 9805,
	9807, 9808, 9810, 9811, 12169, 12170, 9813
};
public int[] skillCapeActionTimer = {
	6, 6, 10, 10, 13, 13, 8, 8, 6, 6, 8, 8, 5, 5, 8, 8,
	6, 6, 6, 6, 10, 10, 4, 4, 12, 12, 12, 12, 4, 4, 10,
	10, 6, 6, 15, 15, 10, 10, 21, 21, 8, 8, 14, 14, 12,
	12, 9, 9, 13, 13
};
public int[] skillCapeAnimation = {
	4959, 4959, 5158, 5158, 4981, 4981, 4961, 4961, 4973, 4973, 4979, 4979, 4939, 4939, 4947,
	4947, 4971, 4971, 4977, 4977, 4969, 4969, 4965, 4965, 4949, 4949, 4937, 4937, 4967, 4967,
	4953, 4953, 4941, 4941, 4943, 4943, 4951, 4951, 4955, 4955, 4975, 4975, 4957, 4957, 4963,
	4963, 8525, 8525, 4945
};
public int[] skillCapeGraphic = {
	823, 823, 907, 907, 828, 828, 824, 824, 832, 832, 829, 829, 813, 813, 817, 817, 833, 833,
	830, 830, 835, 835, 826, 826, 818, 818, 812, 812, 1656, 1656, 820, 820, 814, 814, 815, 815,
	819, 819, 821, 821, 831, 831, 822, 822, 825, 825, 1515, 1515, 816
};

public void doShowOff(Player p) {
	if(p.isBusy) {
		return;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < skillCapeID.length; i++) {
		if (p.equipment[1] == skillCapeID[i]) {
			p.actionTimer = skillCapeActionTimer[i];
			p.setCoords(p.absX, p.absY, 0);
			p.requestAnim(skillCapeAnimation[i], 0);
			p.requestGFX(skillCapeGraphic[i], 0);
		}
	}
	p.isBusy = true;
}

}

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 02:18:36 pm[/size][hr]does any 1 no to fix coz prima’s Offline
